content.webTitle: Pick of the week: Central: Jazz

fields.headline: Pick of the week: Jazz
fields.bodyText: Mathias Eick O'Reilly Theatre, Oxford, Sat 25 Apr; The Edge Arts Centre, Much Wenlock, Sun 26th; Lakeside Arts Centre, Nottingham, Wed 29th Creative Norwegian trumpeter presents powerful composed and improvised music. Madeleine Peyroux Symphony Hall, Birmingham, Fri 1 May One of the subtlest singers on the cusp of jazz and folk, Peyroux sings her autobiographical material from intimate new album Bare Bones. Convergence Quartet Cube Microplex, Bristol, Sat 25 Apr ; Royal Welsh College Of Music And Drama, Cardiﬀ, Tue 28th; The Rainbow, Birmingham, Wed 29th; Holywell Music Room, Oxford, Thu 30th ; Xposed Club, Cheltenham, Fri 1 May Inventive young US/European improv band.
